title: Grand Slam, French Open Men's Singles Results
text: May 31, 2018 / 12:14 AM / Updated 11 hours ago Grand Slam, French Open Men's Singles Results Reuters Staff 3 Min Read May 31 (OPTA) - Results from the Grand Slam, French Open Men's Singles matches on Wednesday .. 1st Round .. Pierre-Hugues Herbert beat Peter Polansky (CAN) 6-3 4-6 6-2 6-2 (FRA) Jeremy Chardy (FRA) beat 17-Tomas Berdych (CZE) 7-6(5) 7-6(8) 1-6 5-7 6-2 Julien Benneteau (FRA) beat Leonardo Mayer (ARG) 2-6 7-6(4) 6-2 6-3 .. 2nd Round .. 8-David Goffin (BEL) beat Corentin Moutet (FRA) 7-5 6-0 6-1 32-Gael Monfils (FRA) beat Martin Klizan (SVK) 6-2 6-4 6-4 Marco Cecchinato (ITA) beat Marco Trungelliti (ARG) 6-1 7-6(1) 6-1 10-Pablo Carreno Busta beat Federico Delbonis (ARG) 7-6(0) 7-6(2) (ESP) 3-6 6-4 13-Roberto Bautista Agut beat Santiago Giraldo (COL) 6-4 7-5 6-3 (ESP) 20-Novak Djokovic (SRB) beat Jaume Munar (ESP) 7-6(1) 6-4 6-4 30-Fernando Verdasco (ESP) beat Guido Andreozzi (ARG) 6-3 6-2 6-2 4-Grigor Dimitrov (BUL) beat Jared Donaldson (USA) 6-7(2) 6-4 4-6 6-4 10-8 Matteo Berrettini (ITA) beat Ernests Gulbis (LAT) 6-2 3-6 6-4 6-3 19-Kei Nishikori (JPN) beat Benoit Paire (FRA) 6-3 2-6 4-6 6-2 6-3 Gilles Simon (FRA) beat 12-Sam Querrey (USA) 1-6 7-6(3) 6-4 6-1 Karen Khachanov (RUS) beat Guillermo Garcia-Lopez 6-2 7-6(7) (ESP) 6-7(0) 6-3 26-Damir Dzumhur (BIH) beat Radu Albot (MDA) 6-3 6-3 5-7 1-6 7-5 2-Alexander Zverev (GER) beat Dusan Lajovic (SRB) 2-6 7-5 4-6 6-1 6-2
